00007 class CMBox {
00008  
00012  public $a;
00013  
00018  public function CMBox(array $a = array()) {
00019   $this->a = $a;
00020  }
00021  
00026  public function draw(array $attr = array()) {
00027   // overrides
00028   $a = $this->a;
00029   foreach($attr as $k => $v)
00030    $a[$k] = $v;
00031    
00032   // start
00033   $r = "<table";
00034   foreach($a as $k => $v) {
00035    if(substr($k, 0, 4) == 'box.')
00036     $r .= " " . substr($k, 4) . "=\"$v\"";
00037   }
00038   $r .= ">";
00039   
00040   // title
00041   if(isset($a['title'])) {
00042    $r .= "<tr><td";
00043    foreach($a as $k => $v) {
00044     if(substr($k, 0, 6) == 'title.')
00045      $r .= " " . substr($k, 6) . "=\"$v\"";
00046    }
00047    $r .= ">$a[title]</td></tr>";
00048   }
00049    
00050   // body
00051   $r .= "<tr><td>$a[body]</td></tr>";
00052   
00053   // end
00054   $r .= "</table>";
00055   return $r;
00056  }
00057  
00058 }
